hanzi-su-wiki:
頭

Значения

Голова, глава; ум, мозг; голова; вожак; верх, начало; счётный суффикс для крупных животных

Мнемоника


Голова 頁 и котелок для варки бобов 豆 схожи по форме и функции. Глава дома начинает еду первым.

Варианты

头

heisig_chinese_memo: The head of the family sits at the head of the table.
heisig_constituent: head, beans, table, one, mouth, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: Here we meet at last the full kanji on which the primitive for head is based. The elements: table . . . head.
koohiiStory1: The head of the family sits at the head of the table.
kunYomi: あたま、かしら、-がしら、かぶり

jp_readingExamples: 頭部 (とうぶ), 年頭 (ねんとう), 船頭 (せんどう), 頭脳 (ずのう), 頭上 (ずじょう), 頭痛 (ずつう), 頭 (あたま), 頭 (かしら)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If a geoduck eats lots of beans, its head will grow larger. To a geoduck, beans are a brain food, so by eating beans, a geoduck’s head will grow incredibly large. Geoducks already look strange enough as it is, let alone with engorged heads.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine, if you will, a geoduck. Now imagine that same geoduck with a massive head. It looks ridiculous, and more disgusting than ever. It’s actually really creeping you out, because the head keeps getting larger as the geoduck eats more beans. Ew.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As the geoduck eats more and more beans, its head gets bigger and bigger until finally the geoduck’s head explodes like an atomic (あたま) bomb. BOOM! Geoduck parts go flying everywhere and pieces of the geoduck’s massive head float to the ground as atomic fallout.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Remember how gross geoducks are? Of course you do. Now imagine one exploding right in front of you. You’ve got geoduck mess all over yourself. It’s gross, slimy, sticky, and covering you from head to toe. It’s wretched.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 并, 口 (рот), 目 (глаз), 豆 (боб), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Ru_trainchinese:
tóu: (сущ) голова; волосы, прическа; шеф, лидер
tóu: (сч.слово) счетное слово для крупных животных (напр., свиней, коров, овец, слонов и т.д.); счетное слово для головки чеснока или лука
tóu: (число/прил) первый (перед числительным); прошлый, прошедший (перед 年 или 天)
tóu: (сущ) конец, кончик, верхушка; начало или конец (события); остаток; сторона, аспект
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the page's (頁) bean (豆) is his head
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You need a large block of ice so you can do the greatest head sculpture ever!
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from " bean " from " page ", " bean " mark, " page " is a symbol, like a human shape but emphasizes the head, the original meaning is head. "Shuowen": "Head, first. From page beans."

It is said that the " bean " in the bronze ware resembles the shape of a person's head and neck connected (Sun Changxu), so the " bean " is not only a sound symbol, but also a meaning symbol.

Bronze " head " as though through " Dou " Cai Hou Ding: "tripod head", that is, "Dou Ding," which means dishes eat tripod. "The Story of the Ram. "The 16th year of Wengong" He Xiu explained: "The murderer slashed his head." "Explanation": "The book is written again." "Yi Li. "Shixiang meets ceremony": "The left head is served." Zheng Xuan's note: "The head of the present text is 焰."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " page " (like a human shape with emphasis on the head), " bean " sound, the original meaning is head.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「豆」從「頁」，「豆」標聲，「頁」是意符，象人形而強調頭部，本義是頭。《說文》：「頭，首也。从頁豆聲。」

　　一說青銅器中的「豆」象人頭頸相連之形(孫常敘)，故「豆」除了是聲符以外，還是意符。

　　金文「頭」通假作「脰」，蔡侯鼎：「頭鼎」，即「脰鼎」，表示饌食之鼎。《公羊傳．文公十六年》何休解詁：「殺人者刎頭。」《釋文》：「本又作脰。」《儀禮．士相見禮》：「左頭奉之。」鄭玄注：「今文頭為脰。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「頁」（象人形而強調頭部），「豆」聲，本義是頭。

  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 豆 [ dòu ] beans, peas; bean-shaped
    • 頁 [ yè ] page, sheet, leaf
①人身體的最上部分或動物身體的最前的部分：頭骨。頭腦。頭臉(ａ．頭和臉；b．指面貌；c．指面子，體面)。頭角(jiǎo)(喻青年的氣概或才華)。
②指頭髮或所留頭髮的樣式：留頭。剃頭。
③物體的頂端：山頭。筆頭。兩頭尖。
④指事情的起點或端緒：從頭兒說起。頭緒。
⑤物體的殘餘部分：布頭兒。
⑥以前，在前面的：頭三天。
⑦次序在前，第一：頭等。頭生。
⑧首領：頭子。頭目。
⑨方面：他們是一頭的。
⑩臨，接近：頭睡覺先洗臉。
⑾量詞，多指牲畜：一頭牛。
⑿表示約計、不定數量的詞：三頭五百。
⒀尾腳。
頭髮 [ tóu fa ]: hair (on the head)
頭腦 [ tóu nǎo ]: brains; mind; skull; (fig.) gist (of a matter); leader; boss
①後綴。
②附在某些名詞後面，構成新的名詞。［合］木頭；石頭。
③附在某些動詞後面，構成名詞。［例］念頭。
④附在形容詞後面，構成名詞。［例］他越學越有甜頭。
⑤附在方位後面，構成新的方位詞。［合］前頭；後頭；抽屜裏頭。
⑥另見tóu。
(Simplified: 头)

金文從「 豆 」從「 頁 」，「 豆 」標聲，「 頁 」是意符，象人形而強調頭部，本義是頭。《說文》：「頭，首也。从頁豆聲。」 一說青銅器中的「 豆 」象人頭頸相連之形(孫常敘)，故「 豆 」除了是聲符以外，還是意符。 金文「 頭 」通假作「 脰 」，蔡侯鼎：「頭鼎」，即「脰鼎」，表示饌食之鼎。《公羊傳．文公十六年》何休解詁：「殺人者刎頭。」《釋文》：「本又作脰。」《儀禮．士相見禮》：「左頭奉之。」鄭玄注：「今文頭為脰。」
Bronze inscriptions from " bean" from " page", " bean" mark, " page" is a symbol, like a human shape but emphasizes the head, the original meaning is head. "Shuowen": "Head, first. From page beans." It is said that the " bean" in the bronze ware resembles the shape of a person's head and neck connected (Sun Changxu), so the " bean" is not only a sound symbol, but also a meaning symbol. Bronze " head" as though through " Dou" Cai Hou Ding: "tripod head", that is, "Dou Ding," which means dishes eat tripod. "The Story of the Ram. "The 16th year of Wengong" He Xiu explained: "The murderer slashed his head." "Explanation": "The book is written again." "Yi Li. "Shixiang meets ceremony": "The left head is served." Zheng Xuan's note: "The head of the present text is 焰."

頭字的基本解释

頭
tóu

頭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tóu］
［《廣韻》度侯切，平侯，定。］
“头1”的繁体字。
(1)人体的最上部分或动物的最前部分。长着口、鼻、眼等器官。
(2)指物体最前面的部分。
(3)指头发。
(4)指所留头发的样式。
(5)最先的；最前的。
(6)前，表示时间在先的。
(7)为首的人。
(8)指出面的人。
(9)磕头。旧时的一种跪拜礼。
(10)端，顶端。
(11)物品的残余部分。
(12)部分，某些整体中的局部。
(13)指赌博或买卖中抽头所得的钱。
(14)方面。
(15)边，畔。
(16)表示约数，兼表数目不大。
(17)指每旬除了“十”、“二十”、“三十”外的日子。
(18)开始；开始阶段。
(19)末了；尽头。
(20)引申为限度。
(21)从；临。表示时间接近某一点。
(22)所在，处所。
(23)势头。好的形势。
(24)指锐气。
(25)量词。用于人。犹个。
(26)量词。用于牲畜、鱼类或昆虫。犹匹，只，尾。
(2

頭字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頭； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1404第20
〔古文〕?【唐韻】度侯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徒侯切，?音投。【說文】首也。【禮·玉藻】頭容直。【釋名】頭，獨也，於體高而獨也。　又古者謂一人爲一頭。【春秋元命苞】十紀，其一曰九頭紀，卽人皇氏。人皇兄弟九人故也。　又【儀禮·士相見禮】贄，冬用雉，夏用腒，左頭奉之。【註】頭，陽也。【疏】執禽者左首。雉以不可生服，故殺之。雖死猶尚左，以從陽也。　又人名。【左傳·僖二十四年】晉侯之豎頭須，守藏者也。【註】豎，小吏，名頭須。　又藥名。【本草綱目】百頭，貫衆也。一名鴟頭。【陶弘景曰】葉似大蕨，毛芒似老鴟頭。　又【唐韻】【正韻】古音徒。【古詩】東方千餘騎，夫壻居上頭。何用識夫壻，白馬從驪駒。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】上紀開闢，邃古之初。五龍比翼，人皇九頭。　又與兜通。【山海經】讙頭國。【註】讙兜，堯臣，有罪投南海而死，帝憐之，使其子居南海而祠之。【博物志】作讙兜國。

考證：〔【廣韻】【正韻】古音徒。〕　謹按廣韻正韻無此音。

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
頭字的起名意思

暂无。

tu
head
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tóu］
["Guangyun" Du Hou Qi, Ping Hou, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "头1".
(1) The uppermost part of the human body or the foremost part of an animal. It has organs such as mouth, nose, and eyes.
(2) Refers to the front part of the object.
(3) Refers to hair.
(4) Refers to the style of hair left.
(5) The first; the first.
(6) Before, it means that the time comes first.
(7) The headed person.
(8) Point out the person to face.
(9) Kowtowing. The old kind of bowing.
(10) End, top.
(11) The remaining part of the article.
(12) Part, part of some whole.
(13) Refers to the money obtained from gambling or trading.
(14) Aspects.
(15) Side, side.
(16) indicates the approximate number, and the number of tables is not large.
(17) Refers to the days except for "ten", "twenty", and "thirty" every ten days.
(18) The beginning; the beginning stage.
(19) The end; the end.
(20) Extended to the limit.
(21) From; Pro. Indicates that the time is approaching a certain point.
(22) Location, location.
(23) Momentum. Good situation.
(24) Refers to sharpness.
(25) Quantifiers. Used for people. Just one.
(26) Quantifiers. Used for livestock, fish or insects. You horse, only, tail.

head
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　头; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1404 No. 20
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Du Hou Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Tu Hou Qi,? Sound cast. [Said the text] First also. [Li·Yuzao] The head is straight. вм. 头

頭

Значения

Голова, глава; ум, мозг; голова; вожак; верх, начало; счётный суффикс для крупных животных

Мнемоника


Голова 頁 и котелок для варки бобов 豆 схожи по форме и функции. Глава дома начинает еду первым.

Варианты

头

Radicals: 豆, 頁  (beans, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
If a geoduck eats lots of beans, its head will grow larger. To a geoduck, beans are a brain food, so by eating beans, a geoduck’s head will grow incredibly large. Geoducks already look strange enough as it is, let alone with engorged heads.
Imagine, if you will, a geoduck. Now imagine that same geoduck with a massive head. It looks ridiculous, and more disgusting than ever. It’s actually really creeping you out, because the head keeps getting larger as the geoduck eats more beans. Ew.
Reading Mnemonic
As the geoduck eats more and more beans, its head gets bigger and bigger until finally the geoduck’s head explodes like an atomic (あたま) bomb. BOOM! Geoduck parts go flying everywhere and pieces of the geoduck’s massive head float to the ground as atomic fallout.
Remember how gross geoducks are? Of course you do. Now imagine one exploding right in front of you. You’ve got geoduck mess all over yourself. It’s gross, slimy, sticky, and covering you from head to toe. It’s wretched.
